releaseNotes: Here's the complete list of what's new
- Fixed a bug where loading indicator was not dismissed in some cases
- Login limit bypass is now integrated into the API itself (spid :B)
- Added support for in-app captcha verification (beta)
- Added switch to fallback to good old web login
- Updated Toolchain, Kotlin and deps to latest version
- Moved the API server to France (not really a change)
